title: 7 Pack Mens Athletic Shorts - Gym Basketball Running Workout Quick Dry Black Shorts with Pockets for Casual Performance
description: Comfortable & Cost-effective: Mens shorts are fabricated with soft materials, offering extreme comfort, excellent breathability, and abundant elasticity.Perfect for everyday wear or intense workouts.The combination of 7 sets is more economical compared to 1,2, 3, and 5 sets.

Fit & LightWeight: Our shorts for men feature an elastic belt design, inclusive of a drawstring. It enables the adjustment of the waist tightness based on personal preferences. Whether during sports or leisure time, it will not shift up and down, providing a very relaxed experience.

Deep pockets design: The mens basketball shorts have two functional pockets, which are convenient for storing small items such as phones and keys. You don't need an extra backpack when going out. And the pocket lines have been upgraded, so they won't easily break even after multiple uses.

Multi-color selection: 7 pack of mens gym workout casual shorts, with a variety of colors, such as black, dark gray, navy, light gray, army green, etc., enjoy a variety of colors at one time, whether it is with casual short sleeves or shirts, you can find the right color.

Scene Application: Athletic shorts men, suitable for different scenarios, can let you sweat in the gym, busy in the office, running outside, and enjoy leisure time at home or outdoors. They can be the ideal choice, bringing comfort, breathability and convenience to life.
